content.text:
# List of Austrian Grammy Award winners and nominees

The following is a list of Grammy Awards winners and nominees from Austria:
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! Category !! Nominees(s) !! Nominated for !! Result
|-
| 1979 || Best Orchestral Performance || Herbert von Karajan || Beethoven: Symphony No. 9 ||
|-
| 1998 || Best World Music Album || Joe Zawinul || My People ||
|-
| 2000 || Remixer of the Year, Non-Classical || Peter Rauhofer || Believe  ||
|-
| rowspan=3|2010 || Technical Award || AKG || ||
|-
| Best Contemporary Jazz Album || Joe Zawinul || 75  ||  (posthumous award)
|-
| Best Recording Package  || Stefan Sagmeister || Everything That Happens Will Happen Today ||
|-
| 2018 || Best Opera Recording || Houston Symphony; Chorus Of Students And Alumni, Shepherd School of Music, Rice University, Houston Grand Opera Children's Chorus
|| Berg: Wozzeck||
|-
|2024
|Best Arrangement, Instrumental or A Cappella
|Markus Illko (The String Revolution featuring Tommy Emmanuel)
|Folsom Prison Blues ||
|}
